content.meaning_en: A shortened form of a word or phrase.
usage_sentences: Please use the full name instead of the abbreviation.
content.note: Don't confuse it with acronym which is the short form of a group of words but pronounced as whole. example - VIBGYOR.

content.meaning_en: To give up one's authority or throne voluntarily.
usage_sentences: The king's abdication surprised the entire nation.
Abdication of responsibility is not an option for a leader.
His theory is too abstruse for the average student.
The philosophical text was abstruse and dense.
content.note: Often used for complex academic subjects.

content.meaning_en: Incapable of making mistakes or being wrong.
content.meaning_hi: अचूक / जो कभी गलती न करे
usage_sentences: He thinks his memory is infallible, but he forgets things often.

content.meaning_en: A person who dislikes, despises, or is strongly prejudiced against women.
usage_sentences: His comments revealed him to be a misogynist.
The novel explores the mind of a bitter misogynist.
